title: Hungary accuses Ukraine of 'oil blockade,' deploys soldiers to key energy facilities
summary_full: Hungary has accused Ukraine of disrupting oil supplies it gets from Russia and has stationed troops at critical energy facilities across the country.
summary_public: Hungary has accused Ukraine of disrupting oil supplies it gets from Russia and has stationed troops at critical energy facilities across the country.
